Behind them, a wall made of corrugated iron sheets can be seen, with many items piled up in front of it.

Behind them is also a large house made of corrugated iron sheets, with two ropes hanging in midair, on which several clothes are drying. Then the man stretches out his hand, holding a handful of pink powder and showing it to the camera. The scene then cuts back to the two women, who run in fear into the house behind them when they see the group.
